tool_description: A place where you can generate certificate which can be shared with the url, and with the unique certificate id you can verify the certificate. it comes with one certificate template, which will increase in future, with the plan to add new certificate every week.
title: Certificate Generator

api_list.name: Get Certificate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/certi/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Verify Certificate
api_list.code:

url = "https://certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/verify/{id}"

headers = {

api_list.name: Generate Certificate
api_list.description: this is the endpoint to generate certificate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/certi"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate Certificate
api_list.description: this is the endpoint to generate certificate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/certi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/certi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certificate-generator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
